thread.title: Kenya: County Debts Worrying

title: Kenya: County Debts Worrying
text:
Kenya: Moi Turns 91 
There is also a need for a clear oversight role to be played by an independent institution to ensure that counties do not borrow at whim because this could pose serious challenges when they start getting saddled with debts. 
At any rate, borrowing should be treated as a last resort since counties collect revenues and can re-allocate the income to pay salaries as they wait for disbursements from the Treasury. 
At all times, there ought to be constant communication between the two institutions, with prudent financial management being the guiding principle. Kenya
